pages.text: Affects wit spells only. Doubles Wit XP gained on spell-cast, and the range of effect of wit spells. Affects:$(li)Path of the Sojourn$(li)Path of Resonance$()

pages.mod_text: Your scepter links with your mind and shares in your cleverness. Imbued with the Witty Scepter and persists on that scepter's paths.
